detail.description:
Enjoy fast and reliable online peso cash loan with fast cash disbursement, easy payment terms and low interest rates with Cashbee! It is a safe and secure online mobile loan app designed to give Filipinos access to financial credit and success.

You’ll receive your cash loan thru your bank account, GCash, Coins.ph wallet or the nearest RD & M Lhuillier Pawnshop within 5 minutes upon approval.

No paperwork needed. No collaterals, no co-guarantor required.

Requirements:
Any functioning smartphone
Cashbee App
One (1) Valid ID

How do I Apply?
Download the Cashbee App
Easy registration process
Verify the information you’ve provided
Wait for approval

What do I need to register?
Just upload one (1) valid Government-Issued ID!

What are the privacy and permission policies of Cashbee ?
Your privacy is our topmost priority! The submitted documents upon your registration will be used to verify your credit profile on our system. We will NOT share any of your data without your direct consent or explicit permission for any purpose.

On the app, we will require the following permissions to verify your identity:
Location Access - To auto-verify your address.
Contacts Access - To easily nominate your contact references.
Camera Access - To scan your ID for complete ID verification

How safe are my personal details?
Fully secured and protected of all personal details and information
Data Privacy Agreements are insisted upon registering
Strictly complies to the guidelines set by the NPC
Routine assessments are done to ensure Quality Data Protection

How fast is the approval and where can I receive the loan?
Approval of loan application can take up to 5 minutes to 24 hours
Upon approval, expect same-day disbursement through Skypay
Cash-out centers: RD Pawnshop and M Lhuillier
Other withdrawal channels: Bank, GCash, Paymaya, and Coins.ph

How do I repay my loan?
Payment can be partial or in full, as long as it is within the loan period
You may check your loan term duration on the app
Pay through our selected payment channels ONLY: RD Pawnshop, M Lhuillier, 7-Eleven, True Money, EC Pay, GCash, Paymaya, and ShopeePay

What loan term packages do you offer?
We offer a variety of packages depending on your user’s  Level
Loan Amount: Php 2,000 - Php 20,000
Loan Duration: 61 - 120 days
Maximum APR: 20%
Transaction fee: Php 0 - Php 150
Other fees: Service fee from 10-20%

PRODUCT INFORMATION
-Amount:₱3,000-₱30,000
-Term: 90days-360 days
-Service fee: 3%-5%
-Transfer Fee: ₱0-₱200
-APR: 18%

Example:
Loan Amount: ₱ 20,000
Loan Term:180-days
with Interest rate: 18%
Transfer fee: ₱ 0
Service fee is ₱ 600
Total service fee and interest will be ₱ 2,400 pesos.
Total received amount is ₱19,400
No monthly payment
Total repayment for 180 days is ₱ 21,800 (20,000*18%/360*180+20,000) only pay on the due date.

*Reminder: Always check the fees, charges, 'Privacy Policy 'and the ‘Terms and Conditions’ of the loan offer before accepting any loan.

Why choose Cashbee?
Cashbee offers all the basic features available in any other app:

Simple, Easy and Fast Registration Process
Accessible and Readily Available App
Multiple Layers of Account Security
Accommodating Customer Service
Exciting Events and Promos

What sets Cashbee apart from any other loaning app is that Cashbee ’s utmost priority is your data privacy. Using our app allows you to increase your  level with just a few loan applications, giving you:
Longer Loan Duration
Increasing Loan Amount
Lower Processing Fees

Contact Us
For questions, feedbacks, or concerns, please reach us at:
Website: www.cashbee.ph
Facebook: facebook.com/cashbeeph
Email: info@cashbee.ph

Cashbee app is operated by Cashbee Lending Services Inc. with Registration No. CS201912321 and Certificate of Authority No. 3041.
